arguments.template:
{{'Welcome' | translate}}
{{'Hi' | translate}}, {{name | async}}!
styles: .nb-theme-default :host nb-card{flex-direction:row;align-items:center;height:6rem;overflow:visible}.nb-theme-default :host nb-card .icon-container{height:100%;padding:.625rem}.nb-theme-default :host nb-card .icon{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;width:5.75rem;height:4.75rem;font-size:3.75rem;border-radius:.25rem;transition:width .4s;transform:translate3d(0,0,0);-webkit-transform-style:preserve-3d;-webkit-backface-visibility:hidden;color:#fff}.nb-theme-default :host nb-card .icon.status-basic{background-image:linear-gradient(to right,#f7f9fc,#edf1f7)}.nb-theme-default :host nb-card .icon.status-basic:hover{background-image:linear-gradient(to arguments.template:
{{ 'message.provider' | translate:provider}}

{{ 'message.deactivated-account' | translate }}
{{item.label ? item.label : item}}

<do-page-outlet [header]="'Change Password'">
  <form [formGroup]="formGroup" pagecontent>
    <do-input-text
      [name]="'password'"
      [label]="'Password'"
      [type]="'password'"
      [required]="true"
      formControlName="password">
    </do-input-text>
    <do-input-text
      [name]="'newPassword'"
      [label]="'New Password'"
      [type]="'password'"
      [required]="true"
      [pattern]="passwordPattern"
      xaValidateNotEqual="password"
      formControlName="newPassword">
    </do-input-text>
    <do-input-text
      [name]="'confirmPassword'"
      [label]="'Confirm Password'"
      [type]="'password'"
      [required]="true"
      xaValidateEqual="newPassword"
      formControlName="confirmPassword">
    </do-input-text>
    <do-button-submit
      [disabledButton]="disabled"
      (onSubmit)="onSubmit()"
      [name]="'Update Password'"
      [formGroupButton]="formGroup">
    </do-button-submit>
  </form>
</do-page-outlet>

{{ 'Deactivate Account' | translate }}

{{ 'message.deactivate-form' | translate }}

{{ 'message.input-password' | translate }}

{{ 'Deactivate Account' | translate }}

{{ 'message.deactivate-form' | translate }}

{{ 'message.input-email' | translate }}
